title: Experts assess Trump’s declaration of fentanyl as weapon of mass destruction
description: “It is not obvious to me that this is a threat," one expert said about President Trump's calling fentanyl a weapon.
content: “It is not obvious to me that this is a threat," one expert said about President Trump's calling fentanyl a weapon.
